arts.ttl: 'Outstanding': Anthony Gordon suggests £13m Newcastle player has been better than Alexander Isak this season
arts.sum: Anthony Gordon has just named his Newcastle Player of the Season so far and much to everyone’s surprise it is not Alexander Isak. Gordon netted...

arts.ttl: 'In principle': Fabrizio Romano says £4m Newcastle player has now agreed a deal to join Saudi Pro League club
arts.sum: Martin Dubravka started for Newcastle United as they pulled off a surprise 2-0 victory against Arsenal at the Emirates Stadium in the first leg of...

arts.ttl: 'I repeated 1000 times': Mikel Arteta reacts after seeing what Arsenal fans did at the Emirates last night
arts.sum: The Arsenal boss is not happy...

arts.ttl: Alexander Isak makes mockery of Arsenal fan and cheeky Newcastle flex
arts.sum: Arsenal fans who gathered outside applauded as Isak got off the team bus while one Gunners supporter even said 'welcome home' as the Newcastle star walked through the players' entrance. Alexander Isak opened the scoring for the visitors with a clever finish before half-time and Anthony Gordon doubled Newcastle's advantage from close range.

arts.ttl: Mikel Arteta slammed for 'nonsensical' decision which cost Arsenal against Newcastle
arts.sum: Arsenal were beaten by Newcastle in the first-leg of their Carabao Cup semi-final and Jamie Redknapp was stunned by their defensive decisions from the set piece that saw them concede

arts.ttl: I saw one Arsenal player prove he's got what it takes to become a superstar despite loss to Newcastle last night - opinion
arts.sum: Arsenal have it all to do in the second leg of their Carabao Cup semi-final after losing 2-0 to Newcastle United at the Emirates Stadium...

arts.ttl: Newcastle United get Ian Wright revenge in off air moment as Arsenal accuse Magpies of 'chaos'
arts.sum: After the game both Eddie Howe and Mikel Arteta were asked about the form of Alexander Isak. With ITV's panel off air, Wright had to compose himself but defeat was hard to take for the ex-England star as he moaned that Martin Odergaard had been shoved by Alexander Isak for the opening goal.

arts.ttl: Latest transfer news: Arsenal want Bellingham as Man Utd target Serie A sensation
arts.sum: The January transfer market is now officially open, with clubs across Europe looking to get deals over the line to enhance their squads for the second half of the season. Teams are already working...

arts.ttl: Premier League fans are all making the same point about Lewis Hall after Newcastle’s Carabao Cup semi-final first-leg win over Arsenal
arts.sum: Newcastle United have put themselves in the driving seat to reach the Carabao Cup final after running out 2-0 winners at Arsenal in their semi-final...

arts.ttl: Isak and the ghost of Henry continue to haunt wasteful Arsenal
arts.sum: Alexander Isak stole all the headlines for Newcastle United, as Arsenal continue to deal with their wasted chances in front of goal.
